job.title: Back End Software Engineer
job.description: strongThe RolebrbrstrongIn this development role you will architect design and develop missioncritical services and applications that require high availability concurrency multitenancy and high scalability for a large global user base The individual in this role will work intimately with various aspect of developing backend services and data storage and retrievalbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Interface with Product Management and Engineering to determine end to end requirements resolve problems and perform testing related to customer facing high traffic services and applicationslili Ensure Service Level Agreements with stakeholders are defined and metlili Design write test and document applications while identifying solutions to complex problemslili Define optimal system performance at scale and at different layers while using system profiling tools and stress testing to find and fix weak spotslili Implement continuous integration regression and deployment while maintaining the existing system and codebaselili Design and build scalable highavailability missioncritical systems and APIslili Ensure feature quality through extensive testing unit integration functional performance and regression with a focus towards automationbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli 2 Years of experience in web application design and development with evidence of exceptional abilitylili Exceptional problem solving and coding skillslili Experience with microservices architectures and APIfirst designlili Design and development experience with applications that require high availability concurrency multitenancy scalabilitylili Experience with Docker and Kuberneteslili Strong SQL Experience MySQL PostgreSQLlili Experience in NOSQL Database like MongoDB or Cassandra is highly desirablelili Strong experience building Web Services that are secure scalable and performantlili Experience with Python and the Django frameworklili Knowledge of different caching strategies performance tuning transaction management across systems and messaging systemslili Experience with Redis or in memory computinglili Experience with NodeJS is a pluslili Experience with GraphQL is a plusliul
